text: @realDonaldTrump @seanhannity @FoxNews I still can’t believe that you weren’t talking about the racial tension or the coronavirus and decided to focus quite a few minutes on how you know how to drink water. I know you’re trolling the dying American public so enjoy your laughs until November.
